beam_dust.f90

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 ! ==============================================
00002 !
00003 !                BEAM_DUST
00004 !
00005 !  Sets up spherical dust particle
00006 !
00007 ! ==============================================
00008 
00009 subroutine beam_dust
00010 
00011   use physvars
00012   use treevars
00013   use utils
00014   implicit none
00015   integer :: i, p, iseed1, iseed2
00016   real :: Volb, dpx, xt, yt, zt
00017   real :: vx_beam, vy_beam, vz_beam, ct, cp, st, sp
00018 
00019 
00020 
00021 
00022   !  evaluate system constants  from inputs:
00023   !  beam cylinder volume:  r_beam is radius
00024 
00025 
00026   Volb = 4*pi/3.*r_beam**3
00027   qeb = Volb*rho_beam/np_beam    ! charge
00028 
00029   if (me==0) then
00030      iseed1 = -333 - np_beam -3*me
00031 
00032      ! proton beam: initialised along x-axis
00033 
00034      ! beam initialised along x-axis and rotated by theta, phi
00035      write (*,*) 'Setting up dust particle'
00036      write (*,'(a20,f12.5)') 'Beam charge ',qeb
00037      write (*,'(a20,f12.5)') 'Ion charge ',qi
00038      ct = cos(theta_beam)
00039      st = sin(theta_beam)
00040      cp = cos(phi_beam)
00041      sp = sin(phi_beam)
00042      vz_beam = u_beam*st
00043      vy_beam = u_beam*ct*cp
00044      vx_beam = u_beam*ct*sp
00045 
00046 
00047      i = 0
00048 
00049      ! Put dust particle on root PE
00050      do while ( i < np_beam)  
00051         yt = r_beam*(2*rano(iseed1)-1.)          
00052         zt = r_beam*(2*rano(iseed1)-1.)  
00053         xt = r_beam*(2*rano(iseed1)-1.)  
00054         if (xt**2 + yt**2 + zt**2 <= r_beam**2 ) then
00055            i = i+1
00056            p = npp+i  ! put them after plasma ions
00057            x(p)= xl/2. + xt        ! Assume disc or slab geometry and inject from side
00058            y(p) = yt + start_beam
00059            z(p) = zt + zl/2.
00060            q(p) = qeb
00061            m(p) = -qeb*mass_beam
00062            ux(p)=vx_beam
00063            uy(p)=vy_beam
00064            uz(p)=vz_beam
00065            pepid(p) = me                ! processor ID
00066            pelabel(p) = ne+ni+i  ! labels
00067         endif
00068      end do
00069      npp = npp + np_beam
00070 
00071   endif
00072   npart = npart + np_beam  ! Augment particle numbers
00073 
00074 end subroutine beam_dust
00075
